meta.title: Zeen International Pipeline Supply - Global Industrial Pipeline Solutions
meta.description: Zeen International is a trusted global supplier of industrial pipeline components since 1995, serving Oil & Gas, Marine, Power Generation, and Infrastructure sectors.

hero.title: Global Industrial Pipeline Supply Solutions
hero.tagline: Pipes. Valves. Flanges. Fittings. Gaskets. Stud Bolts.

about.title: About Zeen International
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for industrial pipeline solutions, serving global clients since 1995
about.historyText: Founded in 1995, Zeen International has grown from a small local supplier to a global leader in industrial pipeline solutions. With headquarters in Dubai and operations across the Middle East, Europe, and Asia, we provide high-quality products and services to the oil & gas, marine, power, and infrastructure sectors.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.text: ISO 9001:2015 certified with rigorous quality control systems

global.title: Global Reach
global.text: Operating in 30+ countries with strategically located warehouses

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.text: Extensive inventory and logistics network for on-time delivery

products.subtitle: Comprehensive selection of high-quality pipeline components for every industrial application

industries.title: Industries We Serve
industries.subtitle: Delivering specialized pipeline solutions for demanding industrial environments

oil.title: Oil & Gas
oil.text: Upstream, midstream, and downstream pipeline components engineered for extreme conditions and meeting strict safety standards.

marine.title: Marine
marine.text: Corrosion-resistant pipeline solutions for shipbuilding, offshore platforms, and marine applications in harsh saltwater environments.

power.title: Power Generation
power.text: High-pressure, high-temperature piping components for conventional and renewable power plants, designed for reliability.

infra.title: Infrastructure
infra.text: Durable pipeline solutions for water treatment, municipal projects, and urban infrastructure development.
